httpErrors.error0Subtitle: Application don't have connection to server. Please check your internet connection.
httpErrors.error401Subtitle: You are not authorized to do this operation. If you think that you should have access to this resource, contact the application administrator.
httpErrors.error500Subtitle: Critical error occured. If the problem still persists, report this incident via GitHub issue.
